item.title: Apple announces multibillion deal with Broadcom to make components in the USA
item.description: - Apple has announced a multibillion-dollar deal with Broadcom to make several key components for Apple devices in the United States.

item.title: FBI misused surveillance powers more than 280k times in a year
item.description: - The FBI misused surveillance powers over 280,000 times to conduct warrantless searches on individuals involved in George Floyd protests, January 6th riots, donors to a congressional campaign, and other surveillance.

item.title: Why do recipe writers lie about how long it takes to caramelize onions? (2012)
item.description: - Recipe writers often lie about how long it takes to caramelize onions, claiming that it only takes 5-10 minutes when it actually takes around 35-40 minutes.

item.title: Waymo & Uber partner to bring autonomous driving technology to Uber
item.description: - Waymo and Uber have announced a new strategic partnership that will bring Waymo's autonomous driving technology to the Uber platform starting in Phoenix.

item.title: Kanboard: free & open source Kanban project management software
item.description: - Kanboard is an open source project management software that uses the Kanban methodology.

item.title: How to start a Go project in 2023
item.description: - The blog post offers a comprehensive guide for starting a Go project in 2023, including installation, setting up, dependencies, testing, and more.

RWKV: Reinventing RNNs for the Transformer Era
item.description: - RWKV is a new method for enhancing the performance of RNNs (Recurrent Neural Networks) in natural language processing tasks.

item.title: SimCity 4 was released 20 years ago
item.description: - SimCity 4, a popular city-building game, turned 20 years old.

item.title: Ableton Push 3
item.description: - Ableton Push 3 is a standalone instrument that gives musicians independence from their computers while making music.
